SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS PartnerKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS PartnerName,
PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c AS ApplicationStatus, PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c AS EventCode, PUB_pm_person_language.pt_language_level_i AS Level, PUB_pm_person_language.pm_years_of_experience_i AS Experience, PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c AS LanguageCode, PUB_p_language.p_language_description_c AS Language

SELECT DISTINCT PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AS PartnerKey, PUB_p_partner.p_partner_short_name_c AS PartnerName, PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c AS ApplicationStatus, PUB_pm_person_language.pt_language_level_i AS Level, PUB_pm_person_language.pm_years_of_experience_i AS Experience, PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c AS LanguageCode, PUB_p_language.p_language_description_c AS Language

PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c LIKE {param_conference_code} AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

PUB_p_unit, PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_p_unit.p_partner_key_n = {{param_unit_key}} AND PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c = PUB_p_unit.p_outreach_code_c AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_p_person.p_partner_key_n = PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master, PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_unit, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extract_name} AND PUB_p_unit.p_partner_key_n = {{param_unit_key}} AND PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c = PUB_p_unit.p_outreach_code_c AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master, PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_unit, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extract_name} AND PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_confirmed_option_code_c LIKE {param_conference_code} AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

PUB_m_extract, PUB_m_extract_master, PUB_pm_short_term_application, PUB_pm_general_application, PUB_p_unit, PUB_p_language WHERE PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n = PUB_m_extract.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_m_extract.m_extract_id_i = PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_id_i AND PUB_m_extract_master.m_extract_name_c = {param_extract_name} AND PUB_p_language.p_language_code_c = PUB_pm_person_language.p_language_code_c

AND PUB_p_person.p_partner_key_n = PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_pm_short_term_application.p_partner_key_n = PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AND NOT PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_st_basic_delete_flag_l = 1 AND NOT PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_app_delete_flag_l = 1 AND PUB_pm_general_application.p_partner_key_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.p_partner_key_n AND PUB_pm_general_application.pm_application_key_i = PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_application_key_i AND PUB_pm_general_application.pm_registration_office_n = PUB_pm_short_term_application.pm_registration_office_n AND PUB_pm_person_language.p_partner_key_n = PUB_p_partner.p_partner_key_n AND ( PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = ''

OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C1' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C2' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C3' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C4' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C5' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C6' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'C7'

OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R1' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R2' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R3' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R4' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R5' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R6' OR PUB_pm_general_application.pm_gen_application_status_c = 'R7'
